Instruction: Steam or boil the cauliflower florets until very tender, about 10-12 minutes.
Drain the cauliflower and transfer it to a food processor.
Add butter, cream cheese, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper to the food processor.
Pulse until the cauliflower is smooth and creamy, scraping down the sides of the bowl as needed.
Transfer the mashed cauliflower to a serving dish.
Garnish with chopped chives before serving.
Enjoy as a creamy and low-carb alternative to mashed potatoes.
